attributes.action: All products sold in the UK to be clearly labelled with country of origin
attributes.additional_details: To create more jobs and aid return to prosperity
attributes.background: At this time when the whole of the UK is suffering in one way or another, let's show solidarity with each other and have the ability to support UK businesses first

departments.name: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
